ticket.tag: activerecord arel enum "hash conditions" postgresql where
ticket.title: Hash conditions fail with PostgreSQL ENUMs
ticket.original-body:
Cannot query a table by an enumerated field.
For example, when gender is a PostgreSQL enum:
@@@ ruby irb(main):004:0> Person.where(:gender => "male").first NoMethodError: undefined method `visit_Arel_Attributes_Undefined' for #<Arel::Visitors::PostgreSQL:0x7f0c52d6b310> from /usr/local/lib/ruby/gems/1.8/gems/arel-2.0.4/lib/arel/visitors/visitor.rb:15:in `send' from /usr/local/lib/ruby/gems/1.8/gems/arel-2.0.4/lib/arel/visitors/visitor.rb:15:in `visit' from /usr/local/lib/ruby/gems/1.8/gems/arel-2.0.4/lib/arel/visitors/to_sql.rb:235:in `visit_Arel_Nodes_Equality' from /usr/local/lib/ruby/gems/1.8/gems/arel-2.0.4/lib/arel/visitors/visitor.rb:15:in `send' from /usr/local/lib/ruby/gems/1.8/gems/arel-2.0.4/lib/arel/visitors/visitor.rb:15:in `visit' from /usr/local/lib/ruby/gems/1.8/gems/arel-2.0.4/lib/arel/visitors/to_sql.rb:109:in `visit_Arel_Nodes_Grouping' from /usr/local/lib/ruby/gems/1.8/gems/arel-2.0.4/lib/arel/visitors/visitor.rb:15:in `send' from /usr/local/lib/ruby/gems/1.8/gems/arel-2.0.4/lib/arel/visitors/visitor.rb:15:in `visit' from /usr/local/lib/ruby/gems/1.8/gems/arel-2.0.4/lib/arel/visitors/to_sql.rb:89:in `visit_Arel_Nodes_SelectCore' from /usr/local/lib/ruby/gems/1.8/gems/arel-2.0.4/lib/arel/visitors/to_sql.rb:89:in `map' from /usr/local/lib/ruby/gems/1.8/gems/arel-2.0.4/lib/arel/visitors/to_sql.rb:89:in `visit_Arel_Nodes_SelectCore' from /usr/local/lib/ruby/gems/1.8/gems/arel-2.0.4/lib/arel/visitors/to_sql.rb:77:in `visit_Arel_Nodes_SelectStatement' from /usr/local/lib/ruby/gems/1.8/gems/arel-2.0.4/lib/arel/visitors/to_sql.rb:77:in `map' from /usr/local/lib/ruby/gems/1.8/gems/arel-2.0.4/lib/arel/visitors/to_sql.rb:77:in `visit_Arel_Nodes_SelectStatement' from /usr/local/lib/ruby/gems/1.8/gems/arel-2.0.4/lib/arel/visitors/postgresql.rb:24:in `visit_Arel_Nodes_SelectStatement' from /usr/local/lib/ruby/gems/1.8/gems/arel-2.0.4/lib/arel/visitors/visitor.rb:15:in `send' from /usr/local/lib/ruby/gems/1.8/gems/arel-2.0.4/lib/arel/visitors/visitor.rb:15:in `visit' from /usr/local/lib/ruby/gems/1.8/gems/arel-2.0.4/lib/arel/visitors/visitor.rb:5:in `accept' from /usr/local/lib/ruby/gems/1.8/gems/arel-2.0.4/lib/arel/visitors/to_sql.rb:19:in `accept' from /usr/local/lib/ruby/gems/1.8/gems/activerecord-3.0.3/lib/active_record/connection_adapters/abstract/connection_pool.rb:110:in `with_connection' from /usr/local/lib/ruby/gems/1.8/gems/arel-2.0.4/lib/arel/visitors/to_sql.rb:17:in `accept' from /usr/local/lib/ruby/gems/1.8/gems/arel-2.0.4/lib/arel/tree_manager.rb:19:in `to_sql' from /usr/local/lib/ruby/gems/1.8/gems/activerecord-3.0.3/lib/active_record/relation.rb:64:in `to_a' from /usr/local/lib/ruby/gems/1.8/gems/activerecord-3.0.3/lib/active_record/relation/finder_methods.rb:333:in `find_first' from /usr/local/lib/ruby/gems/1.8/gems/activerecord-3.0.3/lib/active_record/relation/finder_methods.rb:122:in `first' from (irb):4 @@@
Querying via array substitution works:
@@@ ruby Person.where(["gender=?", "male"]).first @@@
This used to work in Rails 3.0.1.

Cannot query a table by an enumerated field.

ticket.original-body-html:
Cannot query a table by an enumerated field.

For example, when gender is a PostgreSQL enum:

irb(main):004:0> Person.where(:gender => "male").first
NoMethodError: undefined method `visit_Arel_Attributes_Undefined' for #<Arel::Visitors::PostgreSQL:0x7f0c52d6b310>
    from /usr/local/lib/ruby/gems/1.8/gems/arel-2.0.4/lib/arel/visitors/visitor.rb:15:in `send'

    from /usr/local/lib/ruby/gems/1.8/gems/arel-2.0.4/lib/arel/visitors/visitor.rb:5:in `accept'

Querying via array substitution works:

Person.where(["gender=?", "male"]).first

This used to work in Rails 3.0.1.

version.tag: activerecord arel enum "hash conditions" postgresql where
version.title: Hash conditions fail with PostgreSQL ENUMs

version.body:
In edge rails both of these work.
@@@ ruby ree-1.8.7-2010.02 > Car.where(:name => 'honda').first Car Load (0.2ms) SELECT "cars".* FROM "cars" WHERE "cars"."name" = 'honda' LIMIT 1 => #<Car id: 1, name: "honda", color: nil> ree-1.8.7-2010.02 > Car.where(["name = ?",'honda']).first Car Load (0.2ms) SELECT "cars".* FROM "cars" WHERE (name = 'honda') LIMIT 1 => #<Car id: 1, name: "honda", color: nil> ree-1.8.7-2010.02 > @@@
version.body-html:
In edge rails both of these work.

ree-1.8.7-2010.02 > Car.where(:name => 'honda').first
  Car Load (0.2ms)  SELECT "cars".* FROM "cars" WHERE "cars"."name" = 'honda' LIMIT 1
 => #<Car id: 1, name: "honda", color: nil> 
ree-1.8.7-2010.02 > Car.where(["name = ?",'honda']).first
  Car Load (0.2ms)  SELECT "cars".* FROM "cars" WHERE (name = 'honda') LIMIT 1
 => #<Car id: 1, name: "honda", color: nil> 
ree-1.8.7-2010.02 >
version.tag: activerecord arel enum "hash conditions" postgresql where
version.title: Hash conditions fail with PostgreSQL ENUMs

version.body: Remember what should be remembered, and forget what should be forgotten.Alter what is changeable, and accept what is mutable.Apart from tears, only time could wear everything away..When I was asked to give a ugg classic cardy write-up, on the topic Life is Beautiful I smiled. I believed it uggs classic cardy was a simple topic with a very simple proposition. With a firm belief in myself, I tried to pen a few bailey button fancy words. I found myself helpless as I had fiddled away precious bailey button uggs time. Apparently an innocuous proposition made me ponder, which began in a cheap ugg boots argyle listless way and later took a definite direction.As my thought process gained some classic argyle knit ugg boots ground, I could not fathom the depth of this topic nor scale the uggs mini height of it. At one time I thought it could be dealt by filling the write up with anecdotes of my short mini uggs life and thus proving Life is Beautiful. The very next instance made me shudder, as a serious ugg boots ultra topic should be dealt philosophically. A chain developed with one approach giving way to the other.As we grew old ugg ultra tall boots sale together, I would tease you that you had not changed since we first met. But it is true, my uggs tall women darling. I do not see the wrinkles and grey hair that other people see. When I look at you ugg black classic tall sale now, I only see your sweet tender lips and youthful sparkling eyes as we sat and had out first picnic next black short ugg to that small stream, and chased each other around ugg black short that big old oak tree. I remember wishing those sundance ugg boots first few days together would last forever. Do you remember how exciting and wonderful those chestnut ugg boots nightfall days were? ZHC

A chain developed with one approach giving way to the other.As we grew old ugg ultra tall boots sale together, I would tease you that you had not changed since we first met. But it is true, my uggs tall women darling. I do not see the wrinkles and grey hair that other people see. When I look at you ugg black classic tall sale now, I only see your sweet tender lips and youthful sparkling eyes as we sat and had out first picnic next black short ugg to that small stream, and chased each other around ugg black short that big old oak tree. I remember wishing those sundance ugg boots first few days together would last forever. Do you remember how exciting and wonderful those chestnut ugg boots nightfall days were? ZHC

version.body: It seems the answer is to update arel - rails 3.0.4 was still only requiring arel 2.0.2 or later and I had 2.0.3 which was sufficient for that. Updating arel to 2.0.8 seems to fix the problem.
version.body-html: It seems the answer is to update arel - rails 3.0.4 was still only requiring arel 2.0.2 or later and I had 2.0.3 which was sufficient for that. Updating arel to 2.0.8 seems to fix the problem.
